snippet: The Pakistani authorities on Thursday shut down the aid group’s office in Islamabad and ordered its foreign staff members to leave the country within 15 days.
abstract: Pakistani authorities shut down office of aid group Save the Children and orders its foreign staff members to leave country within 15 days.
lead_paragraph: The Pakistani authorities on Thursday shut down the aid group’s office in Islamabad and ordered its foreign staff members to leave the country within 15 days.

headline.main: Save the Children Group Is Shut Down in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: An Aid Group Is Shut Down in Pakistan
